meanings.definition: The quality of being crass or lacking refinement.
meanings.sent1: Her crassitude was evident in the way she spoke loudly in the quiet library.
meanings.sent2: His crassitude was off-putting to those around him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his crassitude, he somehow managed to charm everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The crassitude of his behavior was like a loud, clashing symbol in a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The crassitude of the painting made it stand out among the elegant artworks.

meanings.definition: A crass or vulgar attitude or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's crassitude was not appreciated by the audience.
meanings.sent2: She was taken aback by the crassitude of his remarks.
meanings.sent3: Despite his crassitude, he somehow managed to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The crassitude of his jokes hit a new low.
meanings.sent5: The crassitude of his humor left a sour taste in everyone's mouth.
